Key Match Events: Rahmanullah Gurbaz and Ibrahim Zadaran stitched a record partnership of 154
Fazalhaq Farooqi took five wickets for 9 runs in his spell
Post-Match Reflections: Rashid Khan, the captain of Afghanistan, says that this is the kind of start they wanted as a team and it is all about the mindset.
Brian Masaba, the skipper of Uganda, says that it was pretty special to see their flag and the national anthem at the World Cup. He also credits his team on how they came back.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Chasing 184, Uganda could not even put up a fight as Afghan bowling comfortably dominated them and bundled them out for 58.
For Afghanistan, Farooqi took five wickets while Naveen-Ul-Haq and Rashid Khan scalped two wickets each.
Earlier in the game, Afghanistan were sent into bat first and they made 183 for 5 on the back of attacking 70s from Ibrahim Zadran and Rahmanullah Gurbaz.
